description1: I am a Front End Designer with 10 years of experience as a Desktop Publisher in an international agency. I combine strong expertise in design tools (InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch) with skills in organization, leadership, and English communication. In 2025, I completed a web development bootcamp, gaining knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and agile methodologies. I am eager to grow in Front End by combining design and programming to create digital projects that are creative, user-focused, and impactful.
experience-details-tpt: Experience in adapting graphic design projects into multiple languages, working with tools such as Adobe InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, XD, Figma, and Sketch. During this time, I have developed key skills in organization, teamwork, mentoring, training, and problem-solving in demanding environments.
experience-details-adalab: Over the 6 months of the bootcamp, I learned and strengthened my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SCSS, APIs, and MySQL, applying agile methodologies and working on practical projects that consolidated my knowledge.
catcus: Catcus, find out if a plant is toxic for your cat
harry: Discover and filter all the characters of Harry Potter
store-desc: Fictional website simulating an online store. Allows viewing products and adding them to the cart using Local Storage. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
catcus-desc: CATCUS is a website built with React, HTML, and SCSS that shows whether a plant is toxic to cats. It uses a JSON file to display information and allows viewing details for each plant. Responsive design.
harry-desc: Website built with React, JavaScript, HTML, and SCSS displaying Harry Potter characters from an API. Users can filter by house using a dropdown or search by first/last name. Clicking a character opens a detailed card with all information and the house crest. Responive design.
